title: Maximum resistance of earthing conductors
fullText:
The resistance of any earthing conductor installed between any socket-outlet or the protective earthing terminal of permanently wired electrical equipment and the EP junction or node shall not exceed 0.1 Î©.
Exception:
1  Permanently installed electrical equipment that is inaccessible in the patient environment need not conform.
NOTE: The equipment mentioned in the exception above may be earthed directly to the distribution board.
